about_the_game:
This is a point-and-click adventure game where you go on an adventure with the cat Emma!

Game Features


[exciting adventure story]
A well-structured and exciting adventure story organized by episode awaits you.
Go on an adventure with Emma and uncover her secrets.

[Beautiful backgrounds and attractive NPCs]
Visit many beautiful locations with Emma and make a variety of friends.

[Character Animation]
All actions of Emma and NPCs have been animated.

[Intuitive puzzle construction through item use and combination]
We did not include puzzles for the sake of random puzzles that force longer play time.
Use and combine the necessary items to unfold the story.

[Ability to display interactable objects]
Anyone who has played point-and-click adventure games will empathize with the frustration of repeatedly clicking the mouse all over the screen to find interactive objects.
In order to reduce unnecessary repetitive clicking, this game has been designed to intuitively check the location of objects that can be interacted with through a 'search function'.
